languages.text: "Безделье и праздность порождают ересь. Я благодарю Императора за то, что наградил меня благом труженичиства, ибо оно хранит меня от зломыслия".
"Idleness and slacking breed heresy. I thank the Emperor for blessing me with the gift of hard work, as it keeps me safe from wicked thoughts."
languages.original_text: "Безделье и праздность порождают ересь. Я благодарю Императора за то, что наградил меня благом труженичиства, ибо оно хранит меня от зломыслия".

traits.locale_text: "Idleness and slacking breed heresy. I thank the Emperor for blessing me with the gift of hard work, as it keeps me safe from wicked thoughts."
"Idleness and slacking breed heresy. I thank the Emperor for blessing me with the gift of hard work, as it keeps me safe from wicked thoughts."
"Idleness and slacking breed heresy. I thank the Emperor for blessing me with the gift of hard work, as it keeps me safe from wicked thoughts."

"Idleness and slacking breed heresy. I thank the Emperor for blessing me with the gift of hard work, as it keeps me safe from wicked thoughts."

languages.text: “懒惰和倦怠会滋生异端邪说。感谢帝皇赐予我勤劳的天赋，让我远离那些邪恶的思想。”
languages.original_text: "Idleness and slacking breed heresy. I thank the Emperor for blessing me with the gift of hard work, as it keeps me safe from wicked thoughts."

traits.locale_text: “懒惰和倦怠会滋生异端邪说。感谢帝皇赐予我勤劳的天赋，让我远离那些邪恶的思想。”

languages.text: 「怠惰と怠慢は異端を生み出す。私は労働という贈り物を与えてくれた皇帝に感謝いたします。労働は邪な考えから身を守ってくださるんですから」
languages.original_text: "Idleness and slacking breed heresy. I thank the Emperor for blessing me with the gift of hard work, as it keeps me safe from wicked thoughts."

traits.locale_text: 「怠惰と怠慢は異端を生み出す。私は労働という贈り物を与えてくれた皇帝に感謝いたします。労働は邪な考えから身を守ってくださるんですから」

languages.text: «La ociosidad y la holgazanería engendran herejía. Doy gracias al Emperador por bendecirme con el don del trabajo duro, ya que me mantiene a salvo de pensamientos perversos».
languages.original_text: "Idleness and slacking breed heresy. I thank the Emperor for blessing me with the gift of hard work, as it keeps me safe from wicked thoughts."

traits.locale_text: «La ociosidad y la holgazanería engendran herejía. Doy gracias al Emperador por bendecirme con el don del trabajo duro, ya que me mantiene a salvo de pensamientos perversos».

languages.text: "Faulheit und Müßiggang führen zu Ketzerei. Ich danke dem Imperator, dass er mich mit der Gabe der harten Arbeit gesegnet hat, denn sie bewahrt mich vor bösen Gedanken."
languages.original_text: "Idleness and slacking breed heresy. I thank the Emperor for blessing me with the gift of hard work, as it keeps me safe from wicked thoughts."

traits.locale_text: "Faulheit und Müßiggang führen zu Ketzerei. Ich danke dem Imperator, dass er mich mit der Gabe der harten Arbeit gesegnet hat, denn sie bewahrt mich vor bösen Gedanken."

languages.text: « La paresse et l'oisiveté mènent à l'hérésie. Je remercie l'Empereur de m'avoir offert un dur labeur qui me préserve de toute pensée malveillante. »
languages.original_text: "Idleness and slacking breed heresy. I thank the Emperor for blessing me with the gift of hard work, as it keeps me safe from wicked thoughts."

traits.locale_text: « La paresse et l'oisiveté mènent à l'hérésie. Je remercie l'Empereur de m'avoir offert un dur labeur qui me préserve de toute pensée malveillante. »

languages.text: "Atıllık ve tembellik, kâfirliğe yol açar. Beni birçok işle kutsadığı ve bu sayede aklımı kirli düşüncelerden koruduğu için İmparator'a şükürler olsun."
languages.original_text: "Idleness and slacking breed heresy. I thank the Emperor for blessing me with the gift of hard work, as it keeps me safe from wicked thoughts."

traits.locale_text: "Atıllık ve tembellik, kâfirliğe yol açar. Beni birçok işle kutsadığı ve bu sayede aklımı kirli düşüncelerden koruduğu için İmparator'a şükürler olsun."
